pages.text: Once imbued, your jewelry has the capacity to contain magical auras. $(l)Note that imbued jewelry can only hold one augment. Choose wisely!$()$(br2)If you wish to choose another augment, you may strip your jewelry of its current ability in a $($490)Grindstone$(), or you can retain a copy of the previous augment in a $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/disenchanting_table)Disenchanting Table$()$(br2)Imbued Jewelry adds a shielding aura (effect stacks) to the previous speed boost.
